title: Bedcover, ca. 1850
dimensions: H x W: 264.2 x 228.6 cm (8 ft. 8 in. x 7 ft. 6 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: White quilted bedcover in an allover rosette design. In the center, a large circular pattern of a rayed sun. At four points around the circle are four American eagles with shields and arrows.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Medium: cotton
Technique: machine quilted. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-181-351.
